fullText: Isḥoq Ṣaliba https://gedsh.bethmardutho.org/Ishoq-Saliba http://syriaca.org/bibl/295 286 http://syriaca.org/person/558 person Last bp. of Dayro d-Mor Abay. (d. 1730) [ Syr. Orth. ] Last bp. of Dayro d-Mor Abay. Little is known about his early life. He may have been from Qilleth and may have joined Dayro d-Mor Matay . He was consecrated bp. of Dayro d-Mor Abay with the unusual Syriac, rather than Greek, honorific title Isḥoq. He may have participated in the installation of the anti-patriarch Shemʿun of Maʿdan ca. 1699. After his death in 1730, the diocese of Mor Abay, which then included Ṣawro, Qilleth, and its villages, Bafawah, ʿWein, Kharbah and Maʿsarteh, became part of the diocese of Mardin . Sources Barsoum, in PatMagJer 5 (1938), 138. George A. Kiraz
title: Isḥoq Ṣaliba
